ï»¿An electronic cigarette is just like a regular cigarette...
...except instead of using tobacco it uses oil.
This oil is held in a cartridge or in some e-cigarettes known as a tank,...
...and is heated by an atomizer which creates vapor not smoke which you then inhale.
The earliest e-cigarette was patented in 1963 as a smokeless non-tobacco cigarette.
But it wasn't until 40 years later...
...when a Chinese pharmacist perfected the device that it really took off.
E-cigarette sales increase from about 50,000 units sold in 2008...
E-cigarettes have been touted as a viable alternative to help people quit smoking.
